items.sentence: Tom seems to have fallen into some kind of a coma.
I\'d like to know why you weren\'t here yesterday.
We won\'t be hearing from Tom for quite some time.
Tom didn\'t have to tell me, but I\'m glad he did.
Are you sure that you haven\'t forgotten anything?
Are you sure you don\'t want me to drive you home?
Aren\'t you coming to pick me up tomorrow morning?
Tom, do you like long hair or short hair on girls?
Walk along the river and you will find the school.
Was there anything on the news about the accident?
